## blockRendering.IPathObject interface

An interface for a block's path object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IPathObject 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [addConnectionHighlight(connection, connectionPath, offset, rtl)?](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.ipathobject_interface.addconnectionhighlight_1_methodsignature.md) | _(Optional)_ Adds the given path as a connection highlight for the given connection. |
|  [applyColour(block)?](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.ipathobject_interface.applycolour_1_methodsignature.md) | _(Optional)_ Apply the stored colours to the block's path, taking into account whether the paths belong to a shadow block. |
|  [flipRTL()](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.ipathobject_interface.fliprtl_1_methodsignature.md) | Flip the SVG paths in RTL. |
|  [removeConnectionHighlight(connection)?](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.ipathobject_interface.removeconnectionhighlight_1_methodsignature.md) | _(Optional)_ Removes any highlight associated with the given connection, if it exists. |
|  [setPath(pathString)](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.ipathobject_interface.setpath_1_methodsignature.md) | Set the path generated by the renderer onto the respective SVG element. |
|  [setStyle(blockStyle)?](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.ipathobject_interface.setstyle_1_methodsignature.md) | _(Optional)_ Update the style. |
|  [updateDraggingDelete(enabled)](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.ipathobject_interface.updatedraggingdelete_1_methodsignature.md) | Add or remove styling showing that a block is dragged over a delete area. |
|  [updateHighlighted(highlighted)](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.ipathobject_interface.updatehighlighted_1_methodsignature.md) | Set whether the block shows a highlight or not. Block highlighting is often used to visually mark blocks currently being executed. |
|  [updateInsertionMarker(enabled)](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.ipathobject_interface.updateinsertionmarker_1_methodsignature.md) | Add or remove styling showing that a block is an insertion marker. |
|  [updateMovable(enabled)](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.ipathobject_interface.updatemovable_1_methodsignature.md) | Add or remove styling showing that a block is movable. |
|  [updateSelected(enabled)](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.ipathobject_interface.updateselected_1_methodsignature.md) | Add or remove styling showing that a block is selected. |
